text:
Cyathea Trail connects Bamboo Trail to Hevea Trail.
This trail is a gradual upward climbing of stairs towards Hevea Trail.
Fun fact:
Cyathea is a genus (class or group) of tree ferns.

Went back to explore the various trails as I didn't have the time to do so when I was at the reservoir 3 weeks earlier, and I was certainly not disappointed. O the peace and serenity one could experience if it wasn't so crowded! Would come on a weekday instead of a weekend the next time.
